TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DispatchGroup extends CoreFoundation.DispatchObject

Docs.summary: Manages group of code blocks allows for aggregate synchronization.
Docs.remarks: Code block can be executed on different dispatch queues but managed as a group.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.DispatchGroup Create() cil managed
public void DispatchAsync (MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, Action action);
.method public hidebysig instance void DispatchAsync(class MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, class System.Action action) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void Enter() cil managed

Docs.summary: Explicitly sets that a code block is beeing managed by the group.
Docs.remarks: It can be used to manually manage dispatch group tasks by incrementing the current count of outstanding tasks in the group.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Leave() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases a code block association with the group.
Docs.remarks: It can be used to manually manage dispatch group tasks by decrementing the current count of outstanding tasks in the group.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Notify (MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, Action action);
.method public hidebysig instance void Notify(class MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.DispatchQueue queue, class System.Action action) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance bool Wait(valuetype MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.DispatchTime timeout) cil managed

Docs.param: A DispatchTime that represents the number of nanoseconds to wait.
Docs.summary: Waits synchronously for all blocks in the group to complete or the specified timeout has elapsed.
Docs.returns: true if all code blockes finished before timeout otherwise false.
Docs.remarks: The caller of this method blocks until all blocks in the group complete or a time-out occurs.
